channel.title: Mergers and Acquisitions on Concho Resources

item.title: Recent Transactions and Current Deals On The Market
item.description: Data Sources and Methodology Data obtained from PLS and filtered to show relevant transactions and current deals on the market. Select active deals or previous M&A activity in the map. Table includes current deals. Select Highlights Recent transactions in the Delaware have clustered near the platform on the Eastern side. In the Northern Delaware, Linn Energy and Caza Petroleum have acreage for sale.
